sentences.en: A lot of his designs lack originality.
sentences.cn: 他的很多设计都缺乏创意。

sentences.en: a young writer of great originality
sentences.cn: 一位极富创意的年轻作家

sentences.en: Broadway audiences and critics were struck by its originality, vitality, and excitement.
sentences.cn: 它是那样地别开生面, 生气勃勃, 激动人心,百老汇的观众和评论家无不为之倾倒.

sentences.en: But the final impression of her works is astonishing integrity and originality.
sentences.cn: 但是她的作品最后留给人的印象,却是惊人的完整和富于独创.

sentences.en: Composers write music that is more easily comprehensible without sacrificing originality.
sentences.cn: 作曲家写出既更易为人们理解,又不失其个人独创风格的音乐作品.

sentences.en: He displayed an originality amounting almost to genius.
sentences.cn: 他显示出近乎天才的创造性.

sentences.en: He was capable of writing things of startling originality.
sentences.cn: 他能够写出极具创意的作品。

sentences.en: Her earlier work shows a lot of originality.
sentences.cn: 她的早期作品显示出丰富的独创性。

sentences.en: Nor was Longfellow without originality, of a limited order.
sentences.cn: 朗费罗也不是缺乏独创性, 不过才华不大.

sentences.en: Only minds of extraordinary toughness and originality could resist such a torrent of suggestion.
sentences.cn: 只有非常坚强和有创见的头脑的人才能抵得住如此滔滔不绝的煽动.
他从来不擅长独立创作。

sentences.en: The clay figure is a work of great originality.
sentences.cn: 这尊泥人是颇具独创性的作品.

sentences.en: The name of the game in pop music is originality.
sentences.cn: 流行音乐的本质是独创性.

sentences.en: The work lacks originality , ie is copied or imitated.
This latest collection lacks style and originality.
sentences.cn: 这本最新选集既无风格，又无创意。

sentences.en: This outstanding originality of the newly - made film has been remarked by some critics.
sentences.cn: 这部新拍的影片的突出的独到之处受到了某些评论家的注意.

sentences.en: We must promote originality and encourage innovation.
sentences.cn: 我们必须提倡创意，鼓励革新。

words.tran_cn: 原始的；最初的；独创的；新颖的
有创作力的；有发明之才能的
创意；独创性，创造力；原始；新奇

trans.tran_cn: 独创性，创造性，匠心，独到之处，新颖
trans.tran_en: when something is completely new and different from anything that anyone has thought of before
